items.definition: The state of being happy, healthy, and comfortable.

examples.text: She prioritizes her well-being by exercising regularly.
examples.translation: Dia memprioritaskan kesejahteraannya dengan berolahraga secara teratur.

examples.text: If she doesn't take care of her well-being, she will get sick easily.
examples.translation: Jika dia tidak menjaga kesejahteraannya, dia akan sakit dengan mudah.

examples.text: She exercises regularly and eats healthy food to maintain her well-being.
examples.translation: Dia berolahraga secara teratur dan makan makanan sehat untuk menjaga kesejahteraannya.

examples.text: While she was working, she realized that her well-being was more important than her job, so she decided to quit and start her own business, which allowed her to have more time for herself and her family.
examples.translation: Saat dia bekerja, dia menyadari bahwa kesejahteraannya lebih penting daripada pekerjaannya, sehingga dia memutuskan untuk berhenti dan memulai bisnis sendiri, yang memungkinkan dia untuk memiliki lebih banyak waktu untuk dirinya sendiri dan keluarganya.

items.definition: the state of being protected against a disease or infection, or the state of being safe from harm or injury

examples.text: Vaccination provides immunity to many diseases.
examples.translation: Vaksinasi memberikan kekebalan terhadap banyak penyakit.

examples.text: Because she had been infected with the disease before, she developed immunity to it.
examples.translation: Karena dia telah terinfeksi penyakit itu sebelumnya, dia mengembangkan kekebalan terhadapnya.

examples.text: The country has immunity to the disease, but the neighboring country does not.
examples.translation: Negara tersebut memiliki kekebalan terhadap penyakit itu, tetapi negara tetangga tidak.

examples.text: While the new vaccine provides immunity to the disease, it also has some side effects, because it contains certain chemicals that can cause allergic reactions.
examples.translation: Sementara vaksin baru memberikan kekebalan terhadap penyakit itu, juga memiliki beberapa efek samping, karena mengandung bahan kimia tertentu yang dapat menyebabkan reaksi alergi.

items.definition: The study of food and how it affects the body, or the process of eating and using food to keep the body healthy

examples.text: Proper nutrition is essential for good health.
examples.translation: Gizi yang baik sangat penting untuk kesehatan yang baik.

examples.text: Because she had a poor diet, the doctor advised her that proper nutrition was necessary if she wanted to recover quickly.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki pola makan yang buruk, dokter menyarankannya bahwa gizi yang baik diperlukan jika dia ingin pulih dengan cepat.

examples.text: I exercise regularly and I also eat a healthy diet to ensure I get good nutrition and stay fit.
examples.translation: Saya berolahraga secara teratur dan saya juga makan makanan sehat untuk memastikan saya mendapatkan gizi yang baik dan tetap bugar.

examples.text: While it is true that regular exercise can improve our physical health, it is also important to remember that good nutrition is necessary if we want to achieve the best results, and that is why I always try to eat a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Sementara itu benar bahwa olahraga teratur dapat meningkatkan kesehatan fisik kita, juga penting untuk diingat bahwa gizi yang baik diperlukan jika kita ingin mencapai hasil terbaik, dan itulah mengapa saya selalu mencoba makan makanan seimbang.

items.definition: The condition of being grossly fat or overweight, to the point of being unhealthy.

examples.text: Obesity is a major health problem.
examples.translation: Kegemukan adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar.

examples.text: Because obesity is a major health problem, many people try to lose weight.
examples.translation: Karena kegemukan adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar, banyak orang berusaha untuk menurunkan berat badan.

examples.text: Obesity is a major health problem, and it affects many people worldwide.
examples.translation: Kegemukan adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar, dan itu mempengaruhi banyak orang di seluruh dunia.

examples.text: While obesity is a major health problem that affects many people worldwide, it can be prevented by eating a healthy diet and exercising regularly, because a healthy lifestyle is essential for overall well-being.
examples.translation: Sementara kegemukan adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar yang mempengaruhi banyak orang di seluruh dunia, itu dapat dicegah dengan makan makanan yang sehat dan berolahraga secara teratur, karena gaya hidup sehat sangat penting untuk kesejahteraan secara keseluruhan.

items.definition: a way of life in which people spend a lot of time sitting or not being physically active

examples.text: She leads a sedentary lifestyle.
examples.translation: Dia menjalani gaya hidup kurang gerak.

examples.text: Because she works from home, she has a sedentary lifestyle.
examples.translation: Karena dia bekerja dari rumah, dia menjalani gaya hidup kurang gerak.

examples.text: She leads a sedentary lifestyle and never exercises, but her brother is very active.
examples.translation: Dia menjalani gaya hidup kurang gerak dan tidak pernah berolahraga, tetapi saudaranya sangat aktif.

examples.text: While she leads a sedentary lifestyle, her brother is very active because he works outdoors and enjoys playing sports.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menjalani gaya hidup kurang gerak, saudaranya sangat aktif karena dia bekerja di luar ruangan dan menikmati bermain olahraga.

items.definition: any disease of the heart or the blood vessels, for example coronary heart disease, angina, or stroke

examples.text: Cardiovascular disease is a major cause of death worldwide.
examples.translation: Penyakit kardiovaskular adalah penyebab utama kematian di seluruh dunia.

examples.text: Because she had a family history of cardiovascular disease, she made sure to exercise regularly.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki riwayat keluarga dengan penyakit kardiovaskular, dia memastikan untuk berolahraga secara teratur.

examples.text: Cardiovascular disease is a major health problem, and it is increasing rapidly, especially in developing countries.
examples.translation: Penyakit kardiovaskular adalah masalah kesehatan besar, dan itu meningkat dengan cepat, terutama di negara-negara berkembang.

examples.text: While cardiovascular disease is a major cause of death worldwide, it can be prevented by maintaining a healthy lifestyle, and because of this, many people are now more aware of the importance of regular exercise and a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Sementara penyakit kardiovaskular adalah penyebab utama kematian di seluruh dunia, itu dapat dicegah dengan menjaga gaya hidup sehat, dan karena itu, banyak orang sekarang lebih menyadari pentingnya olahraga teratur dan pola makan seimbang.

items.definition: a medical condition in which the body does not produce enough insulin, leading to high blood sugar levels

examples.text: Diabetes is a common disease.
examples.translation: Penyakit gula atau kencing manis adalah penyakit yang umum.

examples.text: Because she has diabetes, she needs to watch her diet.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita penyakit gula, dia perlu menjaga pola makannya.

examples.text: Diabetes is a serious disease, and it requires constant medical attention.
examples.translation: Penyakit gula adalah penyakit yang serius, dan memerlukan perawatan medis yang konstan.

examples.text: While diabetes is a serious disease, it can be managed with proper diet and exercise, because a healthy lifestyle is crucial for people with this condition.
examples.translation: Sementara penyakit gula adalah penyakit yang serius, penyakit ini dapat dikendalikan dengan pola makan dan olahraga yang tepat, karena gaya hidup sehat sangat penting bagi orang-orang dengan kondisi ini.

items.definition: a medical condition in which the blood pressure is too high

examples.text: The doctor diagnosed her with hypertension.
examples.translation: Dokter mendiagnosa bahwa dia menderita hipertensi.

examples.text: Because she had hypertension, the doctor advised her to reduce her salt intake.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita hipertensi, dokter menyarankannya untuk mengurangi konsumsi garam.

examples.text: The patient had hypertension and diabetes, so she needed to take medication every day.
examples.translation: Pasien menderita hipertensi dan diabetes, jadi dia perlu mengonsumsi obat setiap hari.

examples.text: While the new medication helped to lower her blood pressure, the patient still had to deal with the effects of hypertension, which had already damaged her kidneys.
examples.translation: Sementara obat baru membantu menurunkan tekanan darahnya, pasien masih harus menghadapi dampak hipertensi, yang sudah merusak ginjalnya.

items.definition: a condition that makes someone sick or uncomfortable when they eat, touch, or breathe something

examples.text: She has an allergy to peanuts.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki alergi kacang tanah.

examples.text: Because she has an allergy to dust, she always wears a mask when cleaning.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki alergi debu, dia selalu mengenakan masker saat membersihkan.

examples.text: She has an allergy to cats, and she also hates dogs.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki alergi kucing, dan dia juga membenci anjing.

examples.text: Although she has an allergy to shellfish, she loves eating fish, but she always checks the ingredients carefully.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia memiliki alergi kerang, dia suka makan ikan, tetapi dia selalu memeriksa bahan-bahan dengan hati-hati.

items.definition: A person's condition with regard to their psychological and emotional well-being.

examples.text: She takes care of her mental health by exercising regularly.
examples.translation: Dia menjaga kesehatan mentalnya dengan berolahraga secara teratur.

examples.text: Because she suffered from anxiety, she decided to seek help from a therapist to improve her mental health.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita kecemasan, dia memutuskan untuk mencari bantuan dari seorang terapis untuk memperbaiki kesehatan mentalnya.

examples.text: Mental health is important, and she takes care of it, but her sister neglects her own.
examples.translation: Kesehatan mental penting, dan dia menjaganya, tapi adiknya mengabaikan kesehatan mentalnya sendiri.

examples.text: While mental health is crucial for overall well-being, she has been struggling to maintain hers because she has a lot of work, and her sister, who has the same problem, has been trying to find a balance between work and personal life.
examples.translation: Sementara kesehatan mental sangat penting untuk kesejahteraan secara keseluruhan, dia telah berjuang untuk mempertahankannya karena dia memiliki banyak pekerjaan, dan adiknya, yang memiliki masalah yang sama, telah mencoba untuk menemukan keseimbangan antara pekerjaan dan kehidupan pribadi.

items.definition: a feeling of sadness and hopelessness, often causing a person to lose interest in things they normally enjoy

examples.text: She has been suffering from depression for years.
examples.translation: Dia telah menderita depresi selama bertahun-tahun.

examples.text: Because she lost her job, she felt depressed and didn't know what to do.
examples.translation: Karena dia kehilangan pekerjaannya, dia merasa depresi dan tidak tahu apa yang harus dilakukan.

examples.text: She felt depressed and anxious, but she still went to the party.
examples.translation: Dia merasa depresi dan cemas, tapi dia masih pergi ke pesta.

examples.text: Although she had been suffering from depression for a long time, she still managed to finish her degree because she was determined to succeed, and her family supported her.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia telah menderita depresi selama waktu lama, dia masih berhasil menyelesaikan gelarnya karena dia bertekad untuk sukses, dan keluarganya mendukungnya.

items.definition: a mental health condition where a person feels worried, nervous, or frightened all the time

examples.text: She has an anxiety disorder.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki gangguan kecemasan.

examples.text: Because she has an anxiety disorder, she often feels nervous in public.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki gangguan kecemasan, dia sering merasa gugup di depan umum.

examples.text: She has an anxiety disorder, and she also struggles with depression.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki gangguan kecemasan, dan dia juga berjuang melawan depresi.

examples.text: While she has an anxiety disorder, and she also struggles with depression, her therapist helps her to manage both conditions.
examples.translation: Sementara dia memiliki gangguan kecemasan, dan dia juga berjuang melawan depresi, terapisnya membantunya untuk mengelola kedua kondisi tersebut.

items.definition: treatment for someone who is ill, either physically or mentally, intended to make them better or to help them deal with their condition

examples.text: The doctor recommended therapy to help her recover from the injury.
examples.translation: Dokter merekomendasikan terapi untuk membantunya pulih dari cedera.

examples.text: Because she was feeling anxious, her doctor suggested that she attend therapy sessions to learn how to manage her emotions.
examples.translation: Karena dia merasa cemas, dokternya menyarankan agar dia menghadiri sesi terapi untuk belajar mengelola emosinya.

examples.text: The patient underwent therapy and was given medication to treat her condition, and she was also advised to make lifestyle changes.
examples.translation: Pasien tersebut menjalani terapi dan diberi obat untuk mengobati kondisinya, dan dia juga disarankan untuk membuat perubahan gaya hidup.

examples.text: While the new therapy has shown promising results in treating mental health issues, it is also important to note that each patient's response can vary greatly, and some may need to try different types of therapy before finding what works best for them.
examples.translation: Sementara terapi baru telah menunjukkan hasil yang menjanjikan dalam mengobati masalah kesehatan mental, juga penting untuk dicatat bahwa respons setiap pasien dapat bervariasi secara signifikan, dan beberapa mungkin perlu mencoba jenis terapi yang berbeda sebelum menemukan apa yang paling efektif untuk mereka.

items.definition: the act of giving someone a vaccine to prevent them from getting a disease

examples.text: The doctor recommended vaccination against influenza.
examples.translation: Dokter merekomendasikan vaksinasi terhadap influenza.

examples.text: Because vaccination is mandatory, all children must receive the vaccine before starting school.
examples.translation: Karena vaksinasi adalah wajib, semua anak harus menerima vaksin sebelum memulai sekolah.

examples.text: The hospital offers vaccination and medical check-ups for free, and people can visit the clinic on weekends or weekdays.
examples.translation: Rumah sakit menawarkan vaksinasi dan pemeriksaan medis secara gratis, dan orang dapat mengunjungi klinik pada akhir pekan atau hari kerja.

examples.text: While vaccination is an effective way to prevent the spread of diseases, it is also important to note that people who have certain medical conditions may not be able to receive the vaccine, and they can visit the doctor on weekends or weekdays to discuss their options.
examples.translation: Sementara vaksinasi adalah cara yang efektif untuk mencegah penyebaran penyakit, juga penting untuk dicatat bahwa orang-orang yang memiliki kondisi medis tertentu mungkin tidak dapat menerima vaksin, dan mereka dapat mengunjungi dokter pada akhir pekan atau hari kerja untuk membahas pilihan mereka.

items.definition: a situation in which a large number of people in a particular area all have a particular disease at the same time

examples.text: The flu is an epidemic in the city.
examples.translation: Flu adalah wabah di kota.

examples.text: Because the water supply was contaminated, an epidemic of cholera broke out in the village.
examples.translation: Karena pasokan air terkontaminasi, wabah kolera pecah di desa.

examples.text: The city is experiencing an epidemic of flu, and the hospital is experiencing a shortage of doctors.
examples.translation: Kota tersebut mengalami wabah flu, dan rumah sakit mengalami kekurangan dokter.

examples.text: While the government is trying to control the epidemic of COVID-19, the economy is also experiencing a downturn, and many businesses are struggling to stay afloat because the restrictions are affecting their sales.
examples.translation: Sementara pemerintah berusaha untuk mengendalikan wabah COVID-19, perekonomian juga mengalami kemerosotan, dan banyak bisnis berjuang untuk tetap bertahan karena pembatasan tersebut mempengaruhi penjualan mereka.

items.definition: able to spread or catch a disease

examples.text: The doctor said the illness is contagious.
examples.translation: Dokter mengatakan penyakit itu menular.

examples.text: Although she was feeling unwell, she still came to the party because she didn't know that her illness was contagious.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia merasa tidak enak badan, dia tetap datang ke pesta karena dia tidak tahu bahwa penyakitnya menular.

examples.text: The contagious disease spread quickly, and many people got sick, but fortunately, the hospital was able to provide treatment.
examples.translation: Penyakit menular itu menyebar dengan cepat, dan banyak orang jatuh sakit, tapi untungnya, rumah sakit dapat menyediakan pengobatan.

examples.text: While the contagious disease spread quickly, and many people got sick, the hospital was able to provide treatment, but only because the doctors had experience with similar cases before.
examples.translation: Sementara penyakit menular itu menyebar dengan cepat, dan banyak orang jatuh sakit, rumah sakit dapat menyediakan pengobatan, tapi hanya karena dokter-dokter tersebut memiliki pengalaman dengan kasus serupa sebelumnya.

items.definition: The process of helping someone who has been ill or in prison to become healthy or normal again

examples.text: The patient needs rehabilitation after surgery
examples.translation: Pasien membutuhkan rehabilitasi setelah operasi

examples.text: Because she suffered a stroke, she requires rehabilitation to regain her speech
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita stroke, dia membutuhkan rehabilitasi untuk mendapatkan kembali kemampuan berbicaranya

examples.text: The hospital offers rehabilitation and therapy, and the patient recovers quickly
examples.translation: Rumah sakit menawarkan rehabilitasi dan terapi, dan pasien pulih dengan cepat

examples.text: While the new policy aims to provide rehabilitation for former prisoners, it also requires them to attend therapy sessions because they need to reintegrate into society
examples.translation: Sementara kebijakan baru bertujuan untuk menyediakan rehabilitasi bagi mantan narapidana, juga meminta mereka untuk menghadiri sesi terapi karena mereka perlu kembali berintegrasi ke masyarakat

items.definition: a condition that results from eating a diet in which one or more nutrients are either not enough or are too much such that the diet causes health problems

examples.text: The child was suffering from malnutrition.
examples.translation: Anak itu menderita malnutrisi.

examples.text: Because the village was affected by drought, the crops were damaged, and as a result, malnutrition became a serious problem.
examples.translation: Karena desa itu terkena dampak kekeringan, tanaman rusak, dan sebagai akibatnya, malnutrisi menjadi masalah serius.

examples.text: The doctor diagnosed the patient with malnutrition, and the nurse treated the patient with medication and food supplements.
examples.translation: Dokter mendiagnosa pasien dengan malnutrisi, dan perawat merawat pasien dengan obat dan suplemen makanan.

examples.text: While the new policy aimed to reduce poverty, it also had an unintended consequence, as the change in food prices led to malnutrition, which in turn caused an increase in health problems, and the government had to intervene to mitigate the effects.
examples.translation: Sementara kebijakan baru bertujuan untuk mengurangi kemiskinan, juga memiliki konsekuensi yang tidak diinginkan, karena perubahan harga makanan menyebabkan malnutrisi, yang pada gilirannya menyebabkan peningkatan masalah kesehatan, dan pemerintah harus campur tangan untuk mengurangi dampaknya.

items.definition: a type of medicine that considers the whole person - physical, mental, and emotional - when treating a disease or illness

examples.text: The doctor practices holistic medicine.
examples.translation: Dokter tersebut mempraktikkan pengobatan holistik.

examples.text: Because she believes in holistic medicine, she always asks about her patients' mental and emotional well-being.
examples.translation: Karena dia percaya pada pengobatan holistik, dia selalu bertanya tentang kesejahteraan mental dan emosional pasiennya.

examples.text: The hospital offers holistic medicine and traditional treatments for various diseases.
examples.translation: Rumah sakit tersebut menawarkan pengobatan holistik dan perawatan tradisional untuk berbagai penyakit.

examples.text: While some hospitals specialize in traditional treatments, others prefer holistic medicine, which they believe can cure diseases more effectively because it considers the whole person.
examples.translation: Sementara beberapa rumah sakit berspesialisasi dalam perawatan tradisional, yang lain lebih memilih pengobatan holistik, yang mereka percayai dapat menyembuhkan penyakit lebih efektif karena mempertimbangkan keseluruhan manusia.

items.definition: A treatment or medicine that is made from plants and is used to prevent or cure illnesses or medical conditions.

examples.text: She uses herbal remedies to treat her cold.
examples.translation: Dia menggunakan obat-obatan herbal untuk mengobati flu-nya.

examples.text: Because herbal remedies are natural, they are often preferred over conventional medicines.
examples.translation: Karena obat-obatan herbal adalah alami, mereka sering lebih disukai daripada obat-obatan konvensional.

examples.text: Herbal remedies are popular, and many people use them to stay healthy, but some are not effective.
examples.translation: Obat-obatan herbal populer, dan banyak orang menggunakannya untuk menjaga kesehatan, tetapi beberapa tidak efektif.

examples.text: While some herbal remedies have been proven to be effective, others are not, and because they are not regulated, it is difficult to know which ones are safe, but many people still use them to treat various ailments.
examples.translation: Sementara beberapa obat-obatan herbal telah terbukti efektif, yang lain tidak, dan karena mereka tidak diatur, sulit untuk mengetahui mana yang aman, tetapi banyak orang masih menggunakannya untuk mengobati berbagai penyakit.

items.definition: The state of being physically or mentally dependent on something, especially a drug

examples.text: He has an addiction to coffee
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kecanduan kopi

examples.text: Because he started drinking at a young age, he developed an addiction to alcohol
examples.translation: Karena dia mulai minum pada usia muda, dia mengembangkan kecanduan alkohol

examples.text: She has an addiction to shopping and she also loves traveling
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kecanduan berbelanja dan dia juga suka bepergian

examples.text: While she was studying abroad, she developed an addiction to coffee because she often pulled all-nighters, and she also started to love the local cuisine
examples.translation: Saat dia belajar di luar negeri, dia mengembangkan kecanduan kopi karena dia sering begadang, dan dia juga mulai menyukai masakan lokal

items.definition: a condition that occurs when the body is no longer able to function normally because it has stopped using a substance, such as a drug, to which it has become accustomed

examples.text: The patient experienced withdrawal symptoms after quitting smoking.
examples.translation: Pasien mengalami gejala putus zat setelah berhenti merokok.

examples.text: Because she had been taking the medication for a long time, she suffered from withdrawal symptoms when she stopped using it.
examples.translation: Karena dia telah mengonsumsi obat tersebut dalam waktu lama, dia menderita gejala putus zat ketika dia berhenti menggunakannya.

examples.text: The doctor warned the patient about withdrawal symptoms, and the patient decided to quit smoking gradually.
examples.translation: Dokter memperingatkan pasien tentang gejala putus zat, dan pasien memutuskan untuk berhenti merokok secara bertahap.

examples.text: While the new medication helped to reduce the patient's pain, it also caused withdrawal symptoms, because the patient had been taking the old medication for a long time, and the doctor had to adjust the dosage carefully.
examples.translation: Sementara obat baru membantu mengurangi rasa sakit pasien, juga menyebabkan gejala putus zat, karena pasien telah mengonsumsi obat lama selama waktu lama, dan dokter harus menyesuaikan dosis dengan hati-hati.

items.definition: A condition that someone is born with, which is caused by a problem with their genes

examples.text: The child was born with a genetic disorder.
examples.translation: Anak itu lahir dengan gangguan genetik.

examples.text: Because the family has a history of genetic disorders, they decided to undergo genetic testing.
examples.translation: Karena keluarga memiliki riwayat gangguan genetik, mereka memutuskan untuk melakukan tes genetik.

examples.text: The doctor studied the patient's genetic disorder, and she also examined the family's medical history.
examples.translation: Dokter itu mempelajari gangguan genetik pasien, dan dia juga memeriksa riwayat medis keluarga.

examples.text: While the researchers were studying the genetic disorder, they discovered a new gene that was linked to it, and they also found that it was more common in certain populations.
examples.translation: Saat para peneliti mempelajari gangguan genetik, mereka menemukan gen baru yang terkait dengannya, dan mereka juga menemukan bahwa itu lebih umum di beberapa populasi tertentu.

items.definition: the system that protects the body from infection and disease

examples.text: The immune system helps fight off infections.
examples.translation: Sistem kekebalan tubuh membantu melawan infeksi.

examples.text: Because she had a strong immune system, she was able to recover quickly from the illness.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki sistem kekebalan tubuh yang kuat, dia dapat pulih dengan cepat dari penyakit tersebut.

examples.text: The doctor checked her immune system and prescribed some medication, and she started to feel better soon.
examples.translation: Dokter memeriksa sistem kekebalan tubuhnya dan meresepkan beberapa obat, dan dia mulai merasa lebih baik segera.

examples.text: While the new medicine had improved her condition significantly, it was her immune system that ultimately helped her recover, and she was grateful for the doctor's care.
examples.translation: Sementara obat baru tersebut telah memperbaiki kondisinya secara signifikan, namun itu adalah sistem kekebalan tubuhnya yang akhirnya membantunya pulih, dan dia bersyukur atas perawatan dokter.

items.definition: a disease or condition that affects the lungs or airways, such as asthma or pneumonia

examples.text: The patient was diagnosed with a respiratory illness.
examples.translation: Pasien tersebut didiagnosis menderita penyakit pernapasan.

examples.text: Because she had a respiratory illness, she had to stay in the hospital for several days.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita penyakit pernapasan, dia harus tinggal di rumah sakit selama beberapa hari.

examples.text: The doctor specialized in respiratory illness, and she also taught at the university.
examples.translation: Dokter tersebut berspesialisasi dalam penyakit pernapasan, dan dia juga mengajar di universitas.

examples.text: While the new medication helped to alleviate the symptoms of the respiratory illness, it also had some side effects, and the patient had to be monitored closely.
examples.translation: Sementara obat baru membantu mengurangi gejala penyakit pernapasan, obat tersebut juga memiliki beberapa efek samping, dan pasien harus dipantau dengan ketat.

items.definition: A long-term health condition
a short-term illness that has severe symptoms

examples.text: The patient was diagnosed with an acute illness.
examples.translation: Pasien didiagnosis menderita penyakit akut.

examples.text: Because the patient had been experiencing severe symptoms, the doctor determined that she had an acute illness.
examples.translation: Karena pasien telah mengalami gejala parah, dokter menentukan bahwa dia menderita penyakit akut.

examples.text: The doctor treated the patient for an acute illness, and the nurse provided additional care.
examples.translation: Dokter mengobati pasien untuk penyakit akut, dan perawat memberikan perawatan tambahan.

examples.text: While the doctor treated the patient for an acute illness, the nurse provided additional care because the patient had been experiencing severe symptoms for several days.
examples.translation: Ketika dokter mengobati pasien untuk penyakit akut, perawat memberikan perawatan tambahan karena pasien telah mengalami gejala parah selama beberapa hari.

items.definition: The department of medicine that deals with the prevention and treatment of injuries and diseases that happen as a result of work

examples.text: The company has a department of occupational health.
examples.translation: Perusahaan tersebut memiliki departemen kesehatan kerja.

examples.text: Because the workers were exposed to toxic chemicals, the company was required to provide them with regular occupational health check-ups.
examples.translation: Karena pekerja terpapar bahan kimia beracun, perusahaan diwajibkan untuk memberikan mereka pemeriksaan kesehatan kerja secara teratur.

examples.text: The company provides occupational health services and also offers fitness classes for employees.
examples.translation: Perusahaan menyediakan layanan kesehatan kerja dan juga menawarkan kelas kebugaran untuk karyawan.

examples.text: While the company provides occupational health services, it also requires employees to attend workshops on stress management, because many workers have been experiencing high levels of stress, which can negatively impact their occupational health.
examples.translation: Sementara perusahaan menyediakan layanan kesehatan kerja, juga meminta karyawan untuk menghadiri lokakarya tentang manajemen stres, karena banyak pekerja telah mengalami tingkat stres yang tinggi, yang dapat berdampak negatif pada kesehatan kerja mereka.

items.definition: The state of being clean and free from dirt, bacteria, or other things that can cause disease

examples.text: Washing your hands is an important part of personal hygiene.
examples.translation: Mencuci tangan adalah bagian penting dari kebersihan pribadi.

examples.text: Because she didn't practice good hygiene, she got sick easily.
examples.translation: Karena dia tidak berkebersihan yang baik, dia mudah sakit.

examples.text: I exercise regularly and I also practice good hygiene to stay healthy.
examples.translation: Saya berolahraga secara teratur dan saya juga berkebersihan yang baik untuk menjaga kesehatan.

examples.text: While I was traveling, I made sure to practice good hygiene, because I knew that if I didn't, I would get sick, and also I didn't want to infect others.
examples.translation: Ketika saya bepergian, saya memastikan untuk berkebersihan yang baik, karena saya tahu bahwa jika saya tidak, saya akan sakit, dan juga saya tidak ingin menginfeksi orang lain.

items.definition: The period of life when a young person develops from a child into an adult, from about 13 to 19 years old.

examples.text: Adolescence is a challenging time for many young people.
examples.translation: Masa remaja adalah waktu yang menantang bagi banyak orang muda.

examples.text: Because adolescence is a critical period of development, it is essential to provide young people with proper guidance and support.
examples.translation: Karena masa remaja adalah periode kritis perkembangan, sangat penting untuk menyediakan orang muda dengan bimbingan dan dukungan yang tepat.

examples.text: Adolescence is a time of change, and teenagers often experience mood swings and emotional turmoil, but they also develop new skills and make lasting friendships.
examples.translation: Masa remaja adalah waktu perubahan, dan remaja sering mengalami perubahan mood dan badai emosi, tetapi mereka juga mengembangkan keterampilan baru dan membuat persahabatan yang langgeng.

examples.text: While adolescence can be a difficult and confusing time, it is also a period of great opportunity, because teenagers who are given the chance to develop their talents and pursue their passions often become confident and successful adults, and they are more likely to make a positive impact on their communities, which in turn can lead to a more harmonious and prosperous society.
examples.translation: Sementara masa remaja dapat menjadi waktu yang sulit dan membingungkan, itu juga merupakan periode kesempatan besar, karena remaja yang diberi kesempatan untuk mengembangkan bakat dan mengejar passion mereka sering menjadi dewasa yang percaya diri dan sukses, dan mereka lebih mungkin membuat dampak positif pada masyarakat mereka, yang pada gilirannya dapat menyebabkan masyarakat yang lebih harmonis dan makmur.

items.definition: The period of life when a young person develops physically and sexually to become an adult.

examples.text: She entered puberty at the age of 12.
examples.translation: Dia memasuki masa puber pada usia 12.

examples.text: Because she entered puberty early, she was often self-conscious about her body.
examples.translation: Karena dia memasuki masa puber lebih awal, dia sering merasa tidak nyaman dengan tubuhnya.

examples.text: The boy was excited to start high school, but he was also nervous about going through puberty.
examples.translation: Anak laki-laki itu bersemangat untuk memulai sekolah menengah, tetapi dia juga gugup tentang melewati masa puber.

examples.text: While the girl was excited to start high school, she was also nervous about going through puberty, because she had heard that it could be a difficult time.
examples.translation: Saat gadis itu bersemangat untuk memulai sekolah menengah, dia juga gugup tentang melewati masa puber, karena dia telah mendengar bahwa itu bisa menjadi waktu yang sulit.

items.definition: The process by which the brain develops and matures, especially in children, and by which a person becomes able to think, learn and understand more and more complicated things

examples.text: The child's cognitive development was amazing.
examples.translation: Perkembangan kognitif anak itu luar biasa.

examples.text: Because the teacher used interactive methods, the students' cognitive development improved significantly.
examples.translation: Karena guru menggunakan metode interaktif, perkembangan kognitif siswa meningkat secara signifikan.

examples.text: The child's cognitive development was impressive, and her language skills were excellent.
examples.translation: Perkembangan kognitif anak itu mengesankan, dan kemampuan bahasanya sangat baik.

examples.text: While the students' cognitive development was progressing well, their social skills also improved because the teacher encouraged teamwork, and as a result, they became more confident.
examples.translation: Sementara perkembangan kognitif siswa berjalan dengan baik, kemampuan sosial mereka juga meningkat karena guru mendorong kerja tim, dan sebagai hasilnya, mereka menjadi lebih percaya diri.

items.definition: the ability to control and understand your emotions, and to deal with situations in a mature and sensible way

examples.text: She showed emotional maturity by forgiving her enemy.
examples.translation: Dia menunjukkan kedewasaan emosional dengan memaafkan musuhnya.

examples.text: Because she had achieved emotional maturity, she was able to handle the difficult situation.
examples.translation: Karena dia telah mencapai kedewasaan emosional, dia mampu menangani situasi yang sulit.

examples.text: She was emotionally mature, and she was also very intelligent.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kedewasaan emosional, dan dia juga sangat pintar.

examples.text: While she was emotionally mature, her brother was still struggling to achieve it, because he had not learned how to control his emotions.
examples.translation: Sementara dia memiliki kedewasaan emosional, saudaranya masih berjuang untuk mencapainya, karena dia belum belajar bagaimana mengendalikan emosinya.

items.definition: the ability to behave and communicate effectively with other people

examples.text: She has excellent social skills.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki keterampilan bersosialisasi yang sangat baik.

examples.text: Because she has good social skills, she can easily make friends.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki keterampilan bersosialisasi yang baik, dia dapat dengan mudah berteman.

examples.text: She has social skills and she is very intelligent, so she can succeed in any field.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki keterampilan bersosialisasi dan dia sangat pintar, sehingga dia dapat sukses di bidang apa pun.

examples.text: While she has social skills, which help her to communicate effectively, she also has a strong personality that makes her a great leader, and she is very intelligent, so she can succeed in any field.
examples.translation: Sementara dia memiliki keterampilan bersosialisasi, yang membantunya untuk berkomunikasi secara efektif, dia juga memiliki kepribadian yang kuat yang membuatnya seorang pemimpin hebat, dan dia sangat pintar, sehingga dia dapat sukses di bidang apa pun.

items.definition: the strong influence that a group of people of the same age can have on each other, especially on young people

examples.text: She gave in to peer pressure and started smoking.
examples.translation: Dia menyerah pada tekanan teman sebaya dan mulai merokok.

examples.text: Because she wanted to fit in, she started wearing the same clothes as her friends, even though she didn't like them, which showed that she was vulnerable to peer pressure.
examples.translation: Karena dia ingin bergabung, dia mulai mengenakan pakaian yang sama dengan teman-temannya, meskipun dia tidak menyukainya, yang menunjukkan bahwa dia rentan terhadap tekanan teman sebaya.

examples.text: She joined the club because of peer pressure, and she also wanted to meet new people.
examples.translation: Dia bergabung dengan klub karena tekanan teman sebaya, dan dia juga ingin bertemu orang baru.

examples.text: While she was aware that peer pressure had influenced her decision to join the club, she also realized that she had been wanting to meet new people, and because her friends were already members, she decided to join, even though she was initially hesitant.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menyadari bahwa tekanan teman sebaya telah mempengaruhi keputusannya untuk bergabung dengan klub, dia juga menyadari bahwa dia telah ingin bertemu orang baru, dan karena teman-temannya sudah menjadi anggota, dia memutuskan untuk bergabung, meskipun awalnya dia ragu-ragu.

items.definition: The state of being free from the control or influence of others

examples.text: She values her independence.
examples.translation: Dia menghargai kemerdekaannya.

examples.text: Because she had a job, she was able to maintain her independence.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki pekerjaan, dia dapat mempertahankan kemerdekaannya.

examples.text: She wanted independence, but she also wanted to get married.
examples.translation: Dia ingin kemerdekaan, tetapi dia juga ingin menikah.

examples.text: While she valued her independence, she also knew that getting married would mean that she had to make some compromises, but she was willing to do so because she loved him.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menghargai kemerdekaannya, dia juga tahu bahwa menikah berarti dia harus membuat beberapa kompromi, tetapi dia mau melakukannya karena dia mencintainya.

items.definition: the practice of training people to obey rules or a code of behaviour, using punishment or penalties to correct disobedience

examples.text: She has the discipline to finish her homework on time.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki disiplin untuk menyelesaikan pekerjaan rumahnya tepat waktu.

examples.text: Because she has discipline, she can control her emotions and make rational decisions.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki disiplin, dia dapat mengontrol emosinya dan membuat keputusan rasional.

examples.text: She studies hard and plays sports regularly, and she believes that discipline is essential for success in both areas.
examples.translation: Dia belajar dengan giat dan berolahraga secara teratur, dan dia percaya bahwa disiplin sangat penting untuk kesuksesan di kedua bidang tersebut.

examples.text: While some people think that discipline is restrictive, she believes that it is liberating because it allows her to achieve her goals, and she has learned to appreciate the value of discipline through her experiences.
examples.translation: Sementara beberapa orang berpikir bahwa disiplin membatasi, dia percaya bahwa itu membebaskan karena itu memungkinkan dia untuk mencapai tujuannya, dan dia telah belajar untuk menghargai nilai disiplin melalui pengalamannya.

items.definition: The duty of being accountable for one’s actions
Confidence in one’s abilities and worth
Physical activity that increases heart rate and oxygen intake
Short bursts of high-intensity activity that do not rely on oxygen
The ability to sustain physical activity over time
The ability of muscles and joints to move through their full range of
Exercise designed to increase muscle power and endurance
The efficiency of the heart, lungs, and blood vessels during exercise
The increase in muscle size due to resistance training
The body’s process of converting food into energy
A workout involving short bursts of intense activity followed by rest
The proportion of fat, muscle, and bone in the body
Elastic bands used for strength training exercises
The number of times an exercise is performed in a set
A group of repetitions performed without rest
A preparatory activity before intense exercise
A set of low-intensity exercises performed after a workout
Exercises that involve explosive movements to improve power
The ability to move quickly and easily
The strength of the muscles around the abdomen and lower back
The way in which a person holds their body
The period needed for muscles to heal after exercise
A substance that builds up in muscles during intense exercise
Maintaining sufficient water levels in the body
Excessive exercise that leads to fatigue and decreased performance
Alternating between high and low-intensity exercise
The ability to focus on muscle engagement during exercise
